I now have a good understanding of the project.

## Summary

**tclc** is a Tcl (Tool Command Language) interpreter implementation in C. The project structure includes:

### Core Components
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/core/` - Core interpreter implementation
  - `tclc.c` - Main interpreter code
  - `builtins.c` - Built-in command implementations
  - `builtin_*.c` - Individual builtin command files (file, string, dict, etc.)
  - `internal.h` - Internal header definitions

### Host Implementations
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/hosts/c/` - C host implementation
  - `main.c` - Entry point
  - `host.c` - Host-specific functions
  - `vars.c` - Variable handling

### Testing Infrastructure
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/spec/` - Test specifications
  - `features.yaml` - Feature tracking (implemented, partial, missing)
  - `tests/` - Test cases organized by feature (strings, lists, dicts, etc.)
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/harness/` - Test harness
  - `oracle/` - Expected outputs in JSON format

### Key Features Status (from features.yaml)
- **Implemented**: Core commands (set, puts, expr, proc, if, while, foreach, etc.), string operations, dict operations, file operations, namespaces
- **Partial**: Lists (lsort, lsearch), info command, file operations
- **Missing**: Regexp, coroutines, events, sockets, OO system, packages

### Critical Files for Implementation
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/core/tclc.c` - Core interpreter logic
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/core/builtins.c` - Builtin command registration
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/core/internal.h` - Internal API definitions
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/spec/features.yaml` - Feature tracking
- `/Users/dhamidi/projects/tclc/Makefile` - Build configuration
